Name: Optima Lux
Notes: Commissioned by the University of Mainz choir, based on the idea of 'photography' and inspired by a set of instructions for a Kodak film. The text, which is in Italian, mentions different types of weather and the formal proportions of the piece are based on the camera aperture-settings which are recommended for various light conditions (ombra, scuro, nuvoloso, sole etc.).
Long Description: This work was commissioned by the University of Mainz choir, is based in the idea of 'photography' and was inspired by a set of instructions for a Kodak film. The text, which is in Italian, mentions different types of weather and the formal proportions of the piece are based on the camera aperture-settings which are recommended for various light conditions (ombra, scuro, nuvoloso, sole etc.).
Short Description: A choral work inspired by photography and light conditions, with text in Italian.
